'''Let's Not Cross That Bridge When We Get There''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Lighthouse Locutions]] on the island of [[Calamity Reef]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Do not cross any bridges.</big>
